content: I wouldn't mind some help on this one -- I'm currently getting an error in docs#zmod.ring_hom_eq_of_ker_eq, where a rewrite call to docs#subtype.coe_mk breaks and I have absolutely no clue why.
Doesn't seem to do much unfortunately. I think I found the problem after clicking through enough widgets however: there's a diamond in the has_lift_t instance for the coercion to the base type.
